issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Install the app to a Android device; source is inside the attached zip file
2. launch the App

Actual results: when I launch I get a too deep recursion run time error(see attachment)
expected results: should be able to see the test cases and execute them

note : bugs still occur in 1.8.1 on Rhino
fields.summary: Android: TabGroup - Tabgroup App could not be opened
fields.environment:
Titanium SDK version: 1.9.0.v20120207171634
Javascript Engine: Rhino
Device Details: HTC phone(Android 2.3.4),Samsung GT-p7510(Android 3.2),LG-v909(Android 3.1) tab,Samsung Galaxy Nexus phone(Android 4.0.2)
Titanium Studio version: 1.0.8.201201262211

comments.body:
Issue reproduces with
Titanium Studio, build: 3.0.1.201212181159
Titanium SDK version: 3.1.0 (03/11/13 15:43 0c88429)
Titanium SDK version: 3.0.2 (02/07/13 16:46 a4def81)
Device: Samsung galaxy s duos Android version: 4.0.4

I am unable to reproduce this issue with the following environment;
Pixel (7.1)
Studio 4.9.0.201705302345
Ti SDK 6.1.1.v20170623141152
Appc NPM 4.2.9
Appc CLI 6.2.1
Ti CLI 5.0.13
Alloy 1.9.11
Arrow 2.0.0
Xcode 8.2 (8C38)
Node v4.8.2
